DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether use mobile sense platform primary care set effect provider workflow , patient outcome , patient engagement , patient self-help behavior , health research , total cost care .
DOC.brief_title: Dashboards Clinician Monitoring Patients Through Mobile Sensing Platform
DOC.criteria: Be 18 70 year age . Speak , understand , read conversational English . Be current patient South Huntington Clinic recommend behavioral health care . Have smartphone cell service plan , include voice data , meet device requirement Mobile Sensing Platform . Planning permanently leave Boston study period .
